com.comphenix.protocol.injector.packet

Class PacketInjectorBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.comphenix.protocol.injector.packet.PacketInjectorBuilder

  • public class PacketInjectorBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A builder responsible for creating incoming packet injectors.
    Author:
    Kristian

      • buildInjector

        public PacketInjector buildInjector()
                             throws java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Create a packet injector using the provided fields or the default values.

        Note that any non-null builder parameters must be set.

        Returns:
        The created injector.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - If anything goes wrong in terms of reflection.
